## Secp256k1.generateKeyPair() method

Generates a secp256k1 key pair.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static generateKeyPair(options?: {
        compressedPublicKey?: boolean;
    }): Promise<BytesKeyPair>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | { compressedPublicKey?: boolean; } | _(Optional)_ Optional parameters for the key generation. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[BytesKeyPair](./crypto.byteskeypair.md)<!-- -->&gt;

A Promise that resolves to an object containing the private and public keys as Uint8Array.
